suggestions: 18. Waiver. The waiver of any breach of any provision under this Agreement by any Party or any failure or delay by any Party to enforce any such provision shall not be deemed to be a waiver of any preceding or subsequent breach, nor shall any waiver constitute a continuing waiver.
originalTexts: 18. Waiver. The waiver of any breach of any provision under this Agreement by any Party shall not be deemed to be a waiver of any preceding or subsequent breach, nor shall any waiver constitute a continuing waiver.
